backend/main.mo: Main Internet Computer actor implementing registration submission/retrieval, user profiles, CMS content management (hero, about, event details, coordinators, contact), and gallery storage, with admin-only access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (admin login, CMS, registrations dashboard, analytics, gallery) to their corresponding source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of short summaries for each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key functionality of every page, component, and hook in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.) used throughout the UI.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA titled 'National Level Project Expo 2026', mounting the app at `#root` and loading `src/main.tsx` as a module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration with hash-based history, defining all application routes (home, about, event details, registration, gallery, admin login/dashboard) wrapped in AdminAuthProvider and QueryClientProvider, with ProtectedRoute guarding the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component that fetches CMS content via `useGetAboutContent`, renders a section description and up to three feature cards with IntersectionObserver-triggered staggered bounce-in animations and drifting glow orb backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/AdminContentMana: Admin panel component that provides collapsible section editors for managing all site content (Hero, About, Event Details, Coordinators, Contact) using React Query hooks with save/update functionality and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section component that fetches and displays contact info (address, phone, email, website) with animated intersection-observer cards and links to WhatsApp and Instagram.
frontend/src/components/Coordinators.tsx: Coordinators section component that fetches and renders faculty and student coordinator cards with contact details, animated on scroll into view.
frontend/src/components/EventDetails.tsx: Event Details section component that fetches and displays event info cards (date, venue, fee, eligibility), project categories, and a timeline of milestones with scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/components/FloatingSocialBu: Fixed floating action buttons component that renders WhatsApp and Instagram links in the bottom-right corner with hover tooltips.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer component displaying brand info, quick navigation links, and social media icons (WhatsApp, Instagram) with a scroll-to-top button and gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/GalleryManager.t: Admin component for managing gallery images, supporting upload (with title and file preview) and deletion of images via React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section component featuring a typewriter text animation, a live countdown timer to the event date, and dynamic stats like registration count fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-aware styling, active link highlighting, and a collapsible mobile menu for the IoT Expo site.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to the admin login page using the AdminAuthContext.
frontend/src/components/Registration.tsx: Registration section with an inline form for submitting event registrations, UPI payment info, and a success modal displaying the assigned registration ID.
frontend/src/components/ScrollProgressBa: Fixed top progress bar that visually indicates scroll depth on the page using a green gradient.
frontend/src/context/AdminAuthContext.ts: Simpler admin auth context that stores a boolean authentication flag in sessionStorage with login/logout helpers, without credential validation.
frontend/src/contexts/AdminAuthContext.t: Admin authentication context that validates hardcoded email/password credentials, persists session state in sessionStorage, and exposes login/logout methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing admin access control when authenticated and invalidating dependent queries on actor change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including registration CRUD operations and content management (hero, about, event details, etc.) using TanStack Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Custom hook that uses IntersectionObserver to trigger fade-in or slide-up CSS animations when an element scrolls into view, with configurable delay and threshold.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for the dark green-themed design system, Tailwind imports, scroll animation classes, and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Page component that composes the About section with Navbar, Footer, floating social buttons, and a scroll progress bar.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page displaying registration records with search, CSV export, delete, and expandable detail views, plus tabs for gallery and content management.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page with email/password form that restricts access to a hardcoded admin email and delegates authentication to the AdminAuthContext.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetailsPage.tsx: Page component that renders the EventDetails section wrapped with Navbar, Footer, floating social buttons, and a scroll progress bar.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a responsive photo gallery grid with intersection-observer-based fade-in animations, loading skeletons, and an empty state, fetching images via the useGetGalleryImages hook.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page that composes all primary sections (Hero, About, EventDetails, Coordinators, Registration, Contact) along with Navbar, Footer, and UI utilities.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: 404 error page with a green-themed design featuring decorative glow orbs, a large '404' heading, and a link back to the home route.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationLookupPag: Allows users to look up their event registration status by email, displaying confirmation details or error states based on the query result.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Standalone page that wraps the Registration component with Navbar, Footer, scroll progress bar, and floating social buttons.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Exports an array of Registration objects to a downloadable CSV file, handling timestamp formatting and proper CSV escaping.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts (Poppins, Inter), OKLCH-based semantic color tokens, border radius variables, and a rich set of custom animations and keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for the National Project Expo 2026 admin dashboard, including existing features (admin auth, content management, registrations, analytics) and a pending request to activate full admin management for athiakash1977@gmail.com.
